properties.areaDesc: Coastal Cameron; Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy; Coastal Willacy
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 9 at 3:55AM CST until January 9 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Inland Willacy, Inland Cameron, Coastal Willacy and
Coastal Cameron Counties.

* WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 4 PM CST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree
limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
properties.instruction:
Be sure to secure light weight objects such as lawn furniture,
trash cans, and outdoor holiday decorations. Additionally,
motorists of high profile vehicles are urged to drive with care,
especially if driving on east to west highways, highway flyovers,
bridges, and causeways.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON
